annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Interface for all objects which expose properties on the bus, allowing those properties to be got, set, and signals emitted to notify of changes to the property values.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value:
Retrieves the value of the property at @property_name on @interface_name on this object. If @interface_name is an empty string, all interfaces will be searched for @property_name; if multiple properties match, the result is undefined.
If @interface_name or @property_name do not exist, a #org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.InvalidArgs error is returned.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Name of the interface the property is defined on.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Name of the property to get.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Property value, wrapped in a variant.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Emitted when one or more properties change values on @interface_name. A property may be listed in @changed_properties or @invalidated_properties depending on whether the service wants to broadcast the propertyâ€™s new value. If a value is large or infrequently used, the service might not want to broadcast it, and will wait for clients to request it instead.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Name of the interface the properties changed on.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: Map of property name to updated value for the changed properties.

annotation.name: org.gtk.GDBus.DocString
annotation.value: List of names of other properties which have changed, but whose updated values are not notified.
